name: Custom Order
description:
Custom Orders available and quoted upon request.  Email me @
TheHeartfeltHome@gmail.com

name: Growing Girls in Grace, Book 1
description:
Growing Girls In Grace, Book 1

Growing Girls in Grace is a perfect way for mother and daughter to connect over God's word with crafts. Included in this book is a Bible Memory Verse Card and a detailed craft tutorial for each month of the year. Each month focuses on a different Biblical principle vital to girls of all ages to learn. Start the month by introducing the memory verse card and end each month
discussing the verses and doing the craft together. 


Once I receive payment, I will send you the link to download the eBook.  You can preview chapter 1 on my blog,

http://www.theheartfelthome.com/2013/06/growing-girls-in-grace-book-1-chapter-1.html

name: Bible Memory Verse Pillow Cover, Aqua and Bright Blue
description:
Aqua and Bright Blue Bible Memory Verse Pillow Cover. The pillow cover has a pocket in front that makes the perfect place to keep Bible memory verse cards. Wouldn't this make the perfect gift?

I am so excited about these pillow covers!  My hope for the pillows is that they will be beautiful decoration for your kids' bedrooms with a pocket to tuck Bible verses inside. As a mom who is trying to instill the value of memorizing Bible verses in her children, I know that it is sometimes hard for them to turn to the verses in the Bible each time they sit to work on memorization. 

We write the verses on cards, but then where do you keep the cards?????

The pillows are a safe place to store the cards and a visual reminder to work on memorizing the verses. I hope you love this idea as much as I do! I think these would make great gifts that will become wonderful and sentimental keepsakes!

The pillow cover comes with a gift of 3 starter Bible memory verse cards:
1. Ephesians 6:10-20
2. Psalm 23
3. Romans 3:23, 6:23, 5:8, 10:13, 10:9-10

Pillow Covers are made for forms up to 20 x 20 depending on the pillow fullness desired.  Each pillow has an envelope-style back made of either a white or cream solid fabric.

Each pillow front pictured is the exact pillow you are purchasing; the back and pocket are just samples.

name: Between You and Me Notebook, Pink
description:
Between You and Me Notebook, Pink


Use this notebook to write letters back and forth with your child.  Simply write  letters to your child inside the notebook and place the notebook in a Bible Memory Verse Pillow.  Then they write back to you and put it on your pillow/nightstand.  This is a great way to intentionally encourage your child and build lasting memories.

or

Use this notebook to write letters back and forth with your husband.  Simply write a letter to your husband inside the notebook and place the notebook on his nightstand or in your Marriage Pillow.  Then he writes back to you and puts it on your nightstand or Marriage Pillow.  This is a great way to intentionally speak into each other’s lives and keep the romance alive.

Each notebook comes with 80 lined pages

name: Marriage Pillow Cover, Aqua with Flat Cream Trim
description:
Marriage Pillow Cover, Aqua with Flat Cream Trim

This pillow cover is a beautiful symbol of the love between a husband and wife. It is a symbol that is both useful and treasured. The pillow cover has a pocket in the front that is a perfect place to tuck a love note to your spouse. As notes are passed throughout the years, the pillow will become a treasured reminder of your love.

Each pillow cover comes with a black Between You and Me Notebook

Pillow covers are made for forms up to 20 x 20 depending on the pillow fullness desired.  Each pillow cover has an envelope-style back made of either a white or cream solid fabric.

Each pillow cover front pictured is the exact pillow cover you are purchasing; the back is a sample.

We write the verses on cards, but then where do you keep the cards?????

The pillows are a safe place to store the cards and a visual reminder to work on memorizing the verses. I hope you love this idea as much as I do! I think these would make great gifts that will become wonderful and sentimental keepsakes!

The pillow cover comes with a gift of 3 starter Bible memory verse cards:
1. Ephesians 6:10-20
2. Psalm 23
3. Romans 3:23, 6:23, 5:8, 10:13, 10:9-10

Pillow Covers are made for forms up to 20 x 20 depending on the pillow fullness desired.  Each pillow has an envelope-style back made of either a white or cream solid fabric.

name: Marriage Pillow Cover, Aqua with Brown Trim
description:
Marriage Pillow Cover, Aqua with Brown Trim


This pillow cover is a beautiful symbol of the love between a husband and wife. It is a symbol that is both useful and treasured. The pillow cover has a pocket in the front that is a perfect place to tuck a love note to your spouse. As notes are passed throughout the years, the pillow will become a treasured reminder of your love.

Each pillow cover comes with a black Between You and Me Notebook

Pillow covers are made for forms up to 20 x 20 depending on the pillow fullness desired.  Each pillow cover has an envelope-style back made of either a white or cream solid fabric.

Each pillow cover front pictured is the exact pillow cover you are purchasing; the back is a sample.
